item.title: Random Shirt
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:13, topic:338649”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=435039.msg3197593#msg3197593 date=1272942172]
Lol, badger’s a party pooper.
[/quote]

umm… no.

this is the same as a recolored skillcape… the main color has been changed and a little logo has been slapped on.

if it were some noob who posted this he woulda got flamed by everyone and the peanut gallery.[/quote]actually i never flame recolors, and I have no idea who started that trend. If I don’t think the model has any potential I’ll just not comment. In this case I appreciate it because of the humor involved.

item.title: Random Shirt
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:9, topic:338649”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=435039.msg3195844#msg3195844 date=1272777622]

Dude wtf is this shit?

I believe its a shirt

when i come to the models section im hoping to see real models, all this is is a fucking recolored pre-made shirts with text stuck on top.

and yes i will take you seriously, this isnt at all funny either so “for the lulz” doesnt even work in this situation.

CALM THE FUCK DOWN BEFORE I POP A ARMADYL GODSWORD THROUGH YOUR HEAD!

and quote right you failzor.
[/quote]

oh man… talk about failzor… pop an armadyl godsword through my head… ouch…

your telling me to calm down when im clearly stating the truth, this is just a shitty recolor with a label on it.
the reason nobody has truly flamed you for this yet is bc you probly have 200 rep.
idgaf bout rep so im clearly telling you my opinion.

its a shitty recolor with text. Model something real next time.[/quote]
fine…
by now everyone should know that reps just a number on these forums.

Read full topic
